summary: Natural Favorites Expanded Menu replaces the vanilla favorites menu. It sorts everything into 8 categories and aligns them into a way that makes game play fun and simple.
descriptionHtml:
Natural Favorites Expanded Menu replaces the vanilla favorites menu. It sorts everything into 8 categories and aligns them into a way that makes game play fun and simple. Consumable objects at your fingertips, weapons and shields in one bag, elegant magic sorting, armor,  powers and unique objects supported. Installing this mod is as simple as dropping 2 files into your /data/interface folder and playing the game. 

A huge thanks to Favmenumodder creator of Categorized Favorites Menu ( http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862 ). Natural Favorites Expanded Menu System uses all ideas, code and files with permission. 

There is also a pure mage version available here http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5211 by Kicker.  Users are encouraged to have a look at all 3 before choosing what mod is best for them.

If you see any errors please report them to me and I will update the version.
author: dragonalumni at skyrim nexus
